purpose: The email serves as a call for participation in CONFEST 2025, which will take place from August 25 to August 30, 2025, in Aarhus, Denmark. It highlights the early registration deadline of July 25, 2025, and provides details about the conferences and workshops included in the event. The email also lists invited speakers and their topics, emphasizing the opportunity for attendees to engage with the latest advancements in concurrency theory, formal methods, and quantitative evaluation of systems.
